verbs.description: [ARG1: A group of congressional Democrats] [V: lead] [ARG0: by House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi] toured on Monday several holding facilities in the San Diego region where asylum seekers and their children are being detained separately as a result of Trump administration policies .
